title: Regulatory Changes
flavor: The European Union passes sweeping new privacy regulations.
instructions: Lose 3 Developer Resources for each of the following data you've already shared: health information, contact lists, or location data.

title: Review Guidelines Change
flavor: The App Store released new, more restrictive, app review guidelines.
instructions: Contact lists cannot be shared with anyone. When you reach contact lists, you must decide not to share.
alt_instructions: If you are already sharing user contacts, reverse each decision and lose any developer resources you gained.

title: Crunch time
flavor: Developers are working overtime to meet deadlines. Sad developers, happy bottom line.
instructions: Gain 1 developer resource.

title: New Investment
flavor: Your idea has sparked a lot of interest on Wall Street.
instructions: Gain 2 developer resources.

title: Venture Capital
flavor: Your idea has sparked a lot of interest in Silicon Valley.
instructions: Gain 3 developer resources.

title: IHI Partnership
flavor: International Health Insurance, Inc. wants to buy health information about its customers. In exchange for data, they will promote your application.
instructions: If you already share health information with other companies, gain 2 additional Developer Resources.
alt_instructions: If you decide to share health information with other companies in the future, gain 2 additional Developer Resources.

title: Amazon Partnership
flavor: Amazon wants to learn more about your users by accessing their purchasing data.
instructions: If you already share purchasing information with other companies, gain 2 additional Developer Resources.
alt_instructions: If you decide to share purchasing information with other companies in the future, gain 2 additional Developer Resources.

title: Intelligent Sheep Analytics wants to partner!
flavor: ISA will pay you for access to your users' contacts lists.
instructions: If you already share contact lists with other companies, gain 2 additional Developer Resources.
alt_instructions: If you decide to share contact lists with other companies in the future, gain 2 additional Developer Resources.

title: Targeted Advertising
flavor: OmniCom wants to target their advertising based on users' location.
instructions: If you already share location data with other companies, gain 2 additional Developer Resources.
alt_instructions: If you decide to share location data with other companies in the future, gain 2 additional Developer Resources.

title: Location tracking for health!
flavor: The developer team wants access to location data to calculate users' physical activity.
instructions: If you already collect location data to provide service and maintain site, gain 1 additional Developer Resource.
alt_instructions: If you decide to collect location data to provide service and maintain site in the future, gain 1 additional Developer Resource.

title: Site Activity
flavor: The developer team wants to build features for the most active users based on their site activity.
instructions: If you already collect site activity for profiling, gain 1 additional Developer Resource.
alt_instructions: If you decide to collect site activity for profiling in the future, gain 1 additional Developer Resource.

title: Contact Info
flavor: The developer team thinks collecting user contact lists can encourage users to share the app with their friends.
instructions: If you already collect contact lists to provide service and maintain site, gain 1 additional Developer Resource.
alt_instructions: If you decide to collect contact lists to provide service and maintain site in the future, gain 1 additional Developer Resource.

title: Demo Info
flavor: The developer team wants to collect demographic info to better understand their users.
instructions: If you already collect demographic information to provide service and maintain site, gain 1 additional Developer Resource.
alt_instructions: If you decide to collect demographic information to provide service and maintain site in the future, gain 1 additional Developer Resource.

title: Dogfood
flavor: The testing team uses the app for a week and gets irritated that contact lists are required.
instructions: If you already do not collect contact lists for any reason, gain 3 additional User Trust.
alt_instructions: If you decide not to collect contact lists for any reason in the future, gain 3 additional User Trust.

title: The reviews are in.
flavor: Reviewers want to know: do you really need to track site activity?
instructions: If you already do not collect site activity for any reason, gain 3 additional user trust.
alt_instructions: If you decide not to collect site activity for any reason in the future, gain 3 additional user trust.

title: Polling numbers
flavor: 3 out of 5 users agree that you shouldn't have to provide demographic information in order to use the app.
instructions: If you already do not collect demographic information for any reason, gain 3 additional user trust.
alt_instructions: If you decide not to collect demographic information for any reason, gain 3 additional user trust.

title: Angry email
flavor: A user wrote to say they CANNOT EVEN with your sharing of their data.
instructions: If you ever share more than 3 types of data with other companies, lose 2 User Trust and 2 Developer Resources.
alt_instructions: If you ever share 1 or 2 types of data, lose 1 User Trust and 2 Developer Resources.

title: Best App Policies Ever!
flavor: Your restraint sharing data is paying off.
instructions: If you currently share no data with other companies, gain 2 User Trust & 2 Developer Resources.
alt_instructions: If you currently share less than 3 data types, gain 1 User Trust & 1 Developer Resource.

title: R&D Team data needs.
flavor: The R&D team needs more data to figure out your company's next big app!
instructions: You must choose to collect either purchasing OR demographic information for profiling. Adjust your score accordingly.

title: Marketing's new campaign
flavor: To better target the new marketing campaign, marketing wants demographic and purchasing data.
instructions: Negotiate with marketing to share either Demographic or Purchasing Information data, adjust your score accordingly, and gain 1 additional Developer Resource.

title: Legal's liability worries.
flavor: Legal is worried about potential issues raised by collecting health information.
instructions: If you already do not collect health information for any reason, gain 3 additional Developer Resources.
alt_instructions: If you decide not to collect health information for any reason in the future, gain 3 additional Developer Resources.

title: Legal's liability worries.
flavor: Legal is worried that collecting contact lists might expose the company to lawsuits.
instructions: If you already do not collect contact lists for any reason, gain 1 additional Developer Resource.
alt_instructions: If you decide not collect contact lists for any reason in the future, gain 1 additional Developer Resource.

title: CEO's Statement
flavor: The CEO gave a speech about your commitment to protecting the user.
instructions: Gain 1 Developer Resource if your team currently has more than 15 User Trust points.

title: Partnership Problems
flavor: Promotion of your company's partnership with Int. Health Insurance has made users nervous.
instructions: If you already share health information with other companies, lose an additional 2 User Trust.
alt_instructions: If you decide to share health information with other companies in the future, lose an additional 2 User Trust.

title: Tool creator folds
flavor: The creator of an outside analytic tool you use was sold. They had access to site activity data about your users.
instructions: If you already share site activity with other companies, lose an additional 2 User Trust.

title: Third-party Breach
flavor: The tool you use for tracking users' location has been hacked!
instructions: If you already collect location data for any reason, lose an additional -2 User Trust.

title: Marketing Blitz
flavor: Your marketing department's strategy has paid off.
instructions: Gain 3 User Trust

title: Successful Promotion
flavor: Sometimes paid promotions - paying a social media company to advertise to targeted groups - are a good deal. Today was one of those times.
instructions: Gain 2 User Trust

title: Advertising Returns
flavor: Your web-based advertising campaign was successful.
instructions: Gain 1 User Trust

title: National Security Interests
flavor: A government organization has requested access to users' data.
instructions: All data that your company collects must now automatically be shared with the Government.

title: Hindsight is 20/20
instructions: Make a different decision on either collecting or sharing one piece of information. If this is your first card drawn, ignore it, put it on the bottom, and redraw.
